c:complexType.name: TitlePanel
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the title panel.

c:property.name: visible
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the title panel is visible.
The default value is true, if the title property is non-empty, and false, otherwise.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points of the title panel.

c:complexType.name: TitlePanelExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the title panel.
Title extension points can also be specified directly at the chart options level.
To use an extension point you must find its full name. If it is the chart's title panel, by joining:
chart title panel property name: title
extension property (ex: label)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: textStyle)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: titleLabel_textStyle (see ).
If it is the title panel of an axis, by joining:
chart axis panel property name (ex: xAxis)
axis panel title property name: title
extension property (ex: label)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: textStyle)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: xAxisTitleLabel_textStyle (see ).

c:property.c:documentation:
The extension point of the top-level panel mark.
This extension point, having no own name, coincides with the property name of the panel. For example, for the chart's title panel: title_fillStyle.

c:property.name: label
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the title label mark.
